about_the_game:
Dive into an enchanting world of amphibian adventure in Royally Frogged!

Banished from his kingdom, a young frog prince sets out on an adventure to save his people from the treacherous reign of his father King Croaker. Armed only with his tongue, help our regal hero navigate death defying terrain, solve puzzles, and avoid nefarious foes. With captivating pixel art, charming characters, and innovative puzzle gameplay, Royally Frogged offers an unfrogettable fairy-tale journey filled with majestic leaps and regal charm.

Need more toadally awesome reasons to play? Read on and I'll splash it out for you:

• Unleash the power of the royal tongue to swing your way to safety. Time your swings carefully otherwise you might just find yourself a lone frog in a hungry pond.



• Momentum based swings, gravity defying leaps and buoyancy induced swimming. Experience the feel of a retro inspired platformer with 2D physics at it's core!

• Get cozy on the couch and play comfortably with controller support for that satisfying home console feel.

• Put your leaping skills to the test in death defying hops across treacherous terrain. Avoid the many creatures you will find along the way, a little frog is no match for the terrors of the night.



• Discover Frank's complicated past with his father King Croaker, the secret power that lies within the golden flies, the issues facing the froggy monarchy and most of all, Frank journey to reclaim his place as the rightful heir to the throne.

• Frank will meet many characters on his journey, some are willing to help our regal hero others not so much. Speak to them to learn more about what ribbeting secrets lie within the froggy monarchy.




Croak up some laughs in this fun filled fairy-tale adventure!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game Controller Recommended

name: Royally Frogged

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game Controller Recommended

short_description: Banished from his kingdom, a young frog prince sets out on an adventure to save his people from the reign of King Croaker. There will be many perils along the way for this frog prince, can he swing his way out of trouble?
